dialogue.speaker: Alice
dialogue.message: I suggest we focus on identifying any suspicious behavior or inconsistencies among us to increase the chances of discovering the assassin before it's too late. Let's work together as a team to ensure everyone's safety.

dialogue.speaker: Charlie

dialogue.speaker: Alice

dialogue.speaker: Charlie
